GSD.description:
btrfs: fix use-after-free after failure to create a snapshot

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit a7b717fa15165d3d9245614680bebc48a52ac05d. For more details please see the references link.
